caption: Analysis Target
description: The analysis target defines the scope of monitored activities, specifying what entity, system or process is analyzed for activity patterns.
name: analysis_target

name.description: The specific name or identifier of the analysis target, such as the username of a User Account, the name of a Kubernetes Cluster, the identifier of a Network Namespace, or the name of an Application Component.

type.description: The category of the analysis target, such as User Account, Kubernetes Cluster, Network Namespace, or Application Component.
